attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
The name of the bitstream, it should be unique by onu it is configured for.
i.e. HSIA, TV, etc.

attributes.name: customerElid
attributes.description: The internal identifier of the customer, in FNT's inventory.

attributes.name: customerLocationElid
attributes.description:
The internal identifier of the customer location where the
ont is installed, in FNT's inventory.

attributes.name: servcoReference
attributes.description:
The name of the service connectivity provider, that can be found
in FNT's inventory.

attributes.name: qos
attributes.description: The quality of service for the bitstream connection.

attributes.name: bandwidth
attributes.description: The bandwidth available to the bistream connection.

attributes.name: serviceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier for the epipe deployed from the OLT's PE to the Servco' PE.

attributes.name: oltVlanId
attributes.description: The vlan identifier for the link OLT <> PE

attributes.name: nniVlanId
attributes.description: The vlan identifier for the servco uplink.
